name: Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years from Earth
name_original: Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years from Earth
description:
Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years from Earth is an adventure-RPG game developed by Celestial Software. It was originally released in 1991. Konami published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years from Earth is available on PC.
